sn35.60:3.1: 60 The Complete Understanding of All Grasping
sn35.60:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the principle for the complete understanding of all grasping.
sn35.60:4.3: And what is the principle for the complete understanding of all grasping?
sn35.60:4.4: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights.
sn35.60:4.5: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.60:4.6: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.60:4.7: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple becomes disillusioned with the eye, sights, eye consciousness, eye contact, and feeling.
sn35.60:4.10: When they are released, they understand: ‘I have completely understood grasping.’
sn35.60:4.11: Ear consciousness arises dependent on the ear and sounds. …
sn35.60:4.12: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the nose and smells. …
sn35.60:4.13: Tongue consciousness arises dependent on the tongue and tastes. …
sn35.60:4.14: Body consciousness arises dependent on the body and touches. …
sn35.60:4.15: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and phenomena.
sn35.60:4.16: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.60:4.17: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.60:4.18: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple becomes disillusioned with the mind, phenomena, mind consciousness, mind contact, and feeling.
sn35.60:4.21: When they are released, they understand: ‘I have completely understood grasping.’
sn35.60:4.22: This is the principle for the complete understanding of all grasping.”
